summary: An aging hoodlum wants to turn over a new leaf and decides to invest in a tea-house. However, when the tea-house stands in the way of a development project supported by a rival gang, he must call upon his old gang friends to save his tea-house.
cast: Anthony Chau-Sang Wong|Charlene Choi|You-Nam Wong|Michael Wai-Man Chan|Frankie Chi-Hung Ng|Philip Keung|Deep Ng|Tung Cho 'Joe' Cheung|Carrie Ng|Arthur Wong|Wing-Cheong Law|Wai Ai|Zelia Zhong
title: Da cha fan
